thread.title: Liverpool news: Jurgen Klopp reveals he's a big fan of Kasper Dolberg | Metro News
thread.title_full: Liverpool news: Jurgen Klopp reveals he's a big fan of Kasper Dolberg | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Liverpool news: Jurgen Klopp reveals he's a big fan of Kasper Dolberg | Metro News
text:
George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 1:31 pm Dolberg has been in great form (Picture: Getty) 
Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp has revealed he’s a huge admirer of Ajax striker Kasper Dolberg. 
The Danish attacker has scored 13 goals in 33 appearances for the Dutch giants this season, as well as providing six assists for his team-mates. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
Ajax are known for putting their faith in young talent and Dolberg is the latest to benefit from regular playing time in the Eredivisie. 
Dolberg’s has the fifth-highest number of goals in the Dutch top flight this season and has helped Ajax into second place in the table. Klopp is an admirer(Picture: Getty) 
And Klopp has admitted his work has not gone unnoticed on British shores and that he was a big fan of the 19-year-old. 
‘Who doesn’t know Dolberg? You can’t play at Ajax without being noticed,’ the former Borussia Dortmund boss told Ekstra Bladet. 
‘He has a great future ahead. He is a fantastic player.
